New Records: Ryan Mendes scored the winning penalty for Cape Verde in their first AFCON knockout victory.
Key Match Events: Cape Verde won a spot-kick and Ryan Mendes converted it in the 88th minute to secure a 1-0 victory.
Cape Verde held on for 10 added minutes to advance to the quarter-finals.
Post-Match Reflections: Cape Verde's coach Pedro 'Bubista' Brito believes his side can go further in the tournament and aims for a semi-final spot.
Mauritania's coach Amir Abdou regrets the loss and takes positives from the team's run in the tournament.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Souleymane Anne missed a great chance for Mauritania just before the hour mark.
Cape Verde looked the more likely team as the minutes ticked down.
